message: Hello! I have a great product for sale for $100. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I'm sure you'll love it! What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  But since this is the first product and I don't have any information on its quality, I'm going to pass for now.  I'll keep an eye on your sales and see how things go.
